nodes.text: Lando Calrissian's SE-14r light repeating blaster
Lando Calrissian's SE-14r light repeating blaster was an SE-14r light repeating blaster used by Lando Calrissian during his time as a smuggler in addition to his signature X-8 Night Sniper.

Whenever Lando had to call upon a blaster, it would always be stylish, as with this SE-14r. The pistol was plated in brushed chromium, mined from one of Naboo's moons, with a Tibrin mother-of-pearl handle. It also featured a removable noise suppressor/extended barrel for long-distance targets.
